snippet: Shares in Groupon plummeted more than 5.5 percent, raising questions about the viability of the daily deals site.
abstract: Shares in Groupon plummeted more than 5.5 percent, raising questions about the viability of the daily deals site.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Groupon Shares Hit New Low in Latest Plunge
